resources.string:
Hey All, My name is MD Sajol, A simple guy with extreme thirst for digital knowledge.
I Created #TecHBangla to Connect With Technology .
“TecHBanglapro” is a small Tech Channel on YouTube channel run by myself.I started this channel on Mar 5, 2016.
“TechBangla”, here you’ll find 1 videos everyday, covering Explanation Technologies, Latest Tech News, Tech Tricks and Tutorials, Discussion on Trending Tech Topics and a lots more.
I’m Social,,, I’m active on Social Media Sites; Find me on Facebook, Twitter,Instagram,Linkedin and Pinterest.
Thanks for checking out my story, I appreciate it! If you have anything more to say or have any query, just drop me a mail at Fx.Sajol@gmail.com I reply every single email I receive, so don’t hesitate to mail, and don’t be a stranger!!
Thanks,
MD:Sajol
